bill_title: revise the qualifications for the director of the Division of Veterans Affairs.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the qualifications for the director of the Division of Veterans Affairs. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 33-16-8 be amended to read as follows: 33-16-8. The commissioners shall nominate a director , who shall be the executive head of the Division of Veterans Affairs , and who . The director shall devote full time to the duties of such the office and shall be appointed and serve pursuant to § 1-46-7. The director shall be a citizen of the United States and of the State of South Dakota , and be an honorably discharged wartime veteran. Any additional discharges or separation from the armed forces of the United States held by the individual appointed as the director shall be honorable, regardless of the period of service. 250 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.04 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
